name: Decimal expansion of the isoperimetric quotient of a disdyakis triacontahedron.
comment: For the definition of isoperimetric quotient of a solid, references and links, see A381684.
The disdyakis triacontahedron is the Catalan solid with the highest isoperimetric quotient.
link: Paolo Xausa, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: Equals Pi*r = A000796*r, where r is the largest root of 13997521*x^4 - 1302278*x^2 + 121.
author: _Paolo Xausa_, Mar 20 2025
